data.title: Cheap Flights To Gombe: The Lowest Prices – Travelstart.com.ng
data.meta_description: Compare multiple airlines & book cheap flights to Gombe at Travelstart: ✓ Lowest fares online ✓ Easy online booking - Book today!
data.text:
The city of Gombe is located in the state of the same name and is a relatively new destination to visit, having only been named in 1996. The city is a cultural hub for the locals of various tribes, with markets and shopping areas a great meeting place during the day time. Gombe boasts some impressive architecture such as the Gombe State University, Abubakr Umar Memorial Stadium and the Emir of Gombe Palace which was built for the leading religious scholar of the area and is open for photos to the public.

The city has some wonderful restaurants that cater to the flavours of the region. You can enjoy some local dishes such as fish stew, plantain curry and the delicacy from the area, ‘nkwobi’, which includes meat from the foot of the cow.

Compare several airlines and book your cheap flights to Gombe with Travelstart today!

Gombe is considered to be a calm and safe place to live in and visit, with welcoming locals and a laid-back atmosphere. Gombe was, in 2014, exposed to some terrorist behavior but the government has been monitoring this situation very closely. It is always a good idea to be cautious and make yourself aware of your surroundings. Leave expensive personal belongings in your hotel safe and make sure to not be flashy while walking the streets.

Before your trip to Nigeria, make sure to visit your doctor and ensure that all your routine vaccinations are up to date. You are required to get a shot for yellow fever, and shots for hepatitis A, B and meningitis are recommended as well.
